about.p_1: I am a very creative, adaptable, and efficient person, especially in the technological field. Currently, I work as a frontend developer, creating interesting and intuitive interfaces for users to interact with web applications.
about.p_2: In addition to programming, I also enjoy creating 3D content as I found it to be a very attractive way to express my ideas. The creative process and the result fascinated me.
about.p_3: In general, I am very interested in design and consider myself to have a good eye for it. I understand the principles of visual design and how to create enjoyable experiences for users. I enjoy working in teams, collaborating with designers and other developers, but I am also self-taught and independent.

skills.skill_subtitle: Technologies and Frameworks I worked with
